subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4861 is on the way
description_text:
Although my first order was delivered, I was unaware that the new shifter would cause a delay.

Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter.
 Do I have the option to either change the address or not. Cancelling would be greatly appreciated so that I can update my address before the new year.    On Tuesday, December 16, 2025 at 02:54:45 AM PST, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Jay Trias,    Your order has been shipped. If you need to change the address, please let me know as soon as possible, and I will arrange for the logistics provider to make the change.

Got it, This is the address.
Jay Trias 1053 Clifford Lane Milpitas California 95035-3361United States
Hi Jay Trias,    Okay, we've intercepted the package and will update your information once the interception is complete.
